tool_description:
The YouTube MP3 API iframe generates MP3 Download Buttons in different Qualities (from 320 kbps to 64 kbps).
This API is free and without Ad´s.
name: YouTube MP3 iframe
title: YouTube MP3 iframe

api_list.name: /@api/json/{format}/{youtube-video-id}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dalero-youtube-mp3-iframe-v1.p.rapidapi.com/@api/json/mp3/CevxZvSJLk8"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dalero-youtube-mp3-iframe-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
